segments.advisor_message: So, let's recap what you've shared about your objectives. You mentioned you want to focus on saving for your kids' education and also planning for retirement. Is that correct?
segments.client_message: Yeah, that's right! I really wanna make sure I can pay for their college and also have enough for when I retire, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Great! And you also mentioned that you are currently contributing to a 401(k) plan, but you're considering opening a separate savings account for the education fund. Is that still the plan?
segments.client_message: Exactly! I think the 401(k) is good but I just feel like I need something else, like a dedicated account for their college expenses.

segments.advisor_message: That sounds like a solid strategy. So, to summarize, your main objectives are saving for your kids' education, planning for retirement, and looking to set up a separate account for educational expenses. Did I miss anything?
segments.client_message: Nope, that covers it all! Just wanna make sure I’m on track, you know?
